result.arabic_text: كَذَٰلِكَ يُوحِيٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
result.translation: Muvugishwamana! Imana Allah Yaguhishuriye iyi Qor’ani, nka kurya Yahishuriye Ibitabu n’Imizingo Abavugishwamana bo hambere yawe, ni Yo rero Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa, Intungane mu vyo Ikora.
